cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to a negative value '-5' will cause invalid thread configuration and prevent the CU from allocating resources properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an out-of-range value '10' will cause configuration validation errors and prevent the DU from initializing MIMO processing correctly.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為超出範圍的值 '10'，會導致配置驗證錯誤，並阻止 DU 正確初始化 MIMO 處理。
